Documents for OpenHarmony Developers¶

This project provides documentation including the quick start, development guide, and API reference, Welcome to participate in the open source project and improve these documentation for developers.

中文版本

Directory Structure¶

  • quick-start: Getting Started

  • get-code: Source Code Acquisition/Tool Acquisition

  • driver: Device Development Guidelines

  • kernel: Kernel Usage Guidelines

  • subsystems: Subsystem Development Guidelines

  • bundles: Bundle Development

  • guide: Device Development Guidelines

  • security: Privacy and Security

  • api-LinkIoT: LinkIoT Modules API

  • api-SmartVision-Devices: SmartVision Devices API

  • contribute: Contribution

  • term: Glossary

Contributors & Acknowledgements¶

Great Opensource project wouldn’t exist without the hard work of its many contributors. We’d like to invite anyone from around the world to participate in this exciting journey. And we’re grateful for your time, passion and efforts!

For more details on how to contribute, see Contributing Documents. Excellent contributors will be awarded and publicized in the developer community.

Harmony
